reviewText: It was alright, not what i expected though. not sure if it was worth the price i paid for it but for old movies like these aren't cheap and are not easy to come by, especially this i noticed. once you get into the sceme of things its actually worth the watch. in all i give it a 6/10
Topical story as relevant today as it was in it's time.

Unusual film on a serious subject well performed by Kate O'Mara - sadly passing away just before the video arrived - & Paul Freeman. Need to view again to fully take on board. Surprised not on a DVD or Blueray.
